headline: Thermo Fisher plans to sell parts of diagnostics unit for $4 billion, FT reports
summary: The contract drug manufacturer recently enlisted advisers to explore private equity interest in part of its diagnostics business, including its microbiology unit, which produces infectious disease testing equipment, according to the Financial Times.  The auction process does not guarantee a sale, the report said, adding that Thermo Fisher may decide to retain the asset.  Thermo Fisher did not immediately respond to a Reuters' request for comment.
